Average Inelastic Displacement Ratios (IDRs) for Thin-Takeda Hysteretic Model
Ground Motion Records were Recorded on Firm Soils for Far-fault Records.
µ = 1.5				µ = 2.0				µ = 3.0				µ = 4.0				µ = 5.0
